name: SwordandShieldBattleGuide
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: battle guide
des:
Ask for info on pokemon from sword and shield like type, stats, locations, abilities, and more.

Say "What type is pikachu", "What is grookey's attack" or "where can I find dreepy" to trigger intents

Also provides damage info for battling

To compare speeds say something like "Who is faster, arcanine or charizard?"

You can also ask "How much damage will toxapex take from arcanine using wild charge" or "How much will chandelure do to mimikyu with dark pulse" to give you and edge in competitive battles

To start say "Alexa, open battle guide"

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop" or "Alexa, close the battle guide"
